ValidationRule.description: Cannot move Infleet status to Leasing code and IRK without filled Infleet transportation booked date and Planned infleet date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Infleet_status__c , "IRK and Leasing Code") && ISBLANK( Infleet_transportation_booked_date__c ) && ISBLANK( Planned_Infleet_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move Infleet status to Leasing code and IRK without filling Infleet transportation booked date and Planned infleet date
